title: Server Issues?
body:
Got into an ARAM. Within a minute both my friend and i had lagged out of the game, and we couldn't reconnect as it just kept becoming unresponsive. 
Now I'm stuck with the reconnect button on my client and have been for almost 20 minutes now. 

Are there current server issues or is this just a small glitch?

replies.body: I think it's fixed now, just relogged and everything is fine.

tis fixed. it only took us two whole hours to get out of that game.

that was a great start and end to my league of legends session tonight!
its not on my end of things if everyone in the game has the same problem :)

> [{quoted}](name=SaRawr,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ZteeaAU0,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-23T12:02:42.176+0000)
>
> its not on my end of things if everyone in the game has the same problem :)



The more information you provide, the more information I can pass onto Riot. However, if you insist on not providing that information, that's fine as well. It's only going to delay identifying whether it's an ISP issue and if it is, which ISP.

I just finished an ARAM match without issue.
ive sent in a support ticket. with plenty of logs.
same problem here, tracert gets to 61.88.116.210 then just times out

I'm also stuck with the rest of the people in the same game, if you're looking for a list us here we are..
a55a551n
xXxTommyxXx
CwazyCupQuakes
Brich72
pineappleorgy
mattsupinhere
Nocterus
SaRawr
Ho Lee Fukd
You Got Jinxed

Hope this helped.

Hey SaRawr,

I'm sorry to hear that you're encountering connection issues to the League of Legends servers. Before we start looking at factors that may be causing these issues on the ISP end, I'd first like to confirm that the issue does not lay on your end of things. Can you try as many solutions as you can that are provided in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article?

If those solutions don't work, let's start looking into the diagnostics and see where the issue may be originating. To do this, we'll need you to provide some information for us: 

1. Confirmation that you've tried the solutions in the Troubleshooting Connection Issues article
2. ISP that you're using
3. Region and/or State
4. Trace Route (Tracert) - If you're unsure how to do this, check out [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2)
5. When did these issues begin occurring, and how often?
6. Additional information you'd like to provide

Thank you for your time.
AND AFTER 2 HOURS, THE GAME WAS FINALLY FINISHED... HALLELUJAH
nocterus and i are still stuck in game :/

I still cannot reconnect nor leave the reconnect page. My side of things seem to be fine other that i cannot connect to the server. It states the game has crashed and that i cannot connect to the servers. This is also the case for another i was duo'd with.

> [{quoted}](name=Jusn50,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ZteeaAU0,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-01-23T12:18:00.571+0000)
>
> I still cannot reconnect nor leave the reconnect page. My side of things seem to be fine other that i cannot connect to the server. It states the game has crashed and that i cannot connect to the servers. This is also the case for another i was duo'd with.

Fixed now. :)
